author: adityapatwardhan
body:
GitHub does not allow ~ to be present in the release asset name. The README was updated with filenames having ~ for all non-Windows packages. The links need to be fixed.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell

```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none

```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none

```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

```

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: This has been fixed for latest releases. Closing this. Please re-open if any issues are seen.

title: Download links for non-windows packages are broken for v6.1.0-preview.1
